dcterms:creator: Vanessa LoBue
Cat Thrasher
dcterms:description: The CAFE dataset contains 1192 pictures of children aged 2 to 8 years, depicting various emotions such as anger, disgust, fear, happiness, neutral, sadness, and surprise.
dcterms:title: CAFE (Child Affective Facial Expression)

dcterms:creator: Kirsten A Dalrymple
Jesse Gomez
Brad Duchaine
dcterms:description: The Dartmouth database contains 640 images of children's faces aged 6 to 16 years, used for studying facial emotion recognition.
dcterms:title: Dartmouth database of children’s faces

dcterms:creator: Helen Link Egger
Daniel S Pine
Eric Nelson
Ellen Leibenluft
Monique Ernst
Kenneth E Towbin
Adrian Angold
dcterms:description: The NIMH-ChEFS dataset includes 482 images of children aged 10 to 17 years, designed for recognizing children's facial emotions.
dcterms:title: NIMH-ChEFS (NIMH Child Emotional Faces picture Set)

dcterms:creator: Behnaz Nojavanasghari
Tadas Baltruˇsaitis
Charles E Hughes
Louis-Philippe Morency
dcterms:description: EmoReact is a multimodal dataset containing 1102 audio-visual clips of children aged 4 to 14 years, aimed at recognizing emotional responses.
dcterms:title: EmoReact

dcterms:creator: Ian J Goodfellow
Dumitru Erhan
Pierre Luc Carrier
Aaron Courville
Mehdi Mirza
Ben Hamner
Will Cukierski
Yichuan Tang
David Thaler
Dong-Hyun Lee
dcterms:description: The FER dataset is a large-scale dataset for facial expression recognition, containing 28,000 images depicting various emotions, primarily of adults but also including some children.
dcterms:title: FER (Facial Expression Recognition challenge)

dcterms:creator: Evelyn Fan
dcterms:description: Awesome-FER is a code repository that lists various datasets for facial expression recognition, including a limited number of children-specific datasets.
dcterms:title: Awesome-FER
